name: Invasion of the Ball Beings from Sigma Pavonis
name_original: Invasion of the Ball Beings from Sigma Pavonis
description:
The Ball Beings are invading! You, conscript, must serve your two minute tour of duty in the hell of battle! Kill as many as you can.

Made for the KO Slam Jam 2023.

There was supposed to be a webgl build but it was completely broken, even though the windows version works just fine.

Also there is a spelling mistake in the intro - "hectice" should be "hectic"

CONTROLS

Shoot: M1/M2 (it's a double barrel shotgun)

Reload: R to open, M1/M2 to reload, R to close (it's break-action)
